text: In March 1995, State Representative Norman Rokeberg responded to the sudden interest in same-sex marriage by introducing House Bill 227 in the Alaska House of Representatives to add language restricting marriage to the union of one man and one woman to the state statutes. ==City and Borough of Juneau== The city of Juneau issues domestic partnership benefits to same-sex couples. ==References== Category:United States federal legislation Category:Same-sex marriage
title: Same-sex marriage in Alaska
